name: immunity
effect: This Pokémon cannot be poisoned. This includes bad poison. If a Pokémon is poisoned and acquires this ability, its poison is healed; this includes when regaining a lost ability upon leaving battle.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The immune system of the Pokémon prevents it from getting poisoned.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The immune system of the Pokémon prevents it from getting poisoned.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The immune system of the Pokémon prevents it from getting poisoned.
